comments.raw_text:
This is my fault, and fallout from bug 373996. Asuth, any ideas on where SetFocusMessagePane should go? I was thinking in the FolderDisplayWidget, perhaps, or maybe somewhere in msgHdrViewOverlay.js.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Open a message with attachments in a new window
2) Expand the attachment pane
3) Collapse the attachment pane; notice the error
comments.author: jporterbugs@gmail.com
comments.text:
This is my fault, and fallout from bug 373996. Asuth, any ideas on where SetFocusMessagePane should go? I was thinking in the FolderDisplayWidget, perhaps, or maybe somewhere in msgHdrViewOverlay.js.

comments.raw_text: What's the side effects of this? Anything visible to the user?
comments.creator: standard8@mozilla.com
comments.author: standard8@mozilla.com
comments.text: What's the side effects of this? Anything visible to the user?

comments.raw_text: The only side effect is that when you collapse the attachment pane in the standalone message window, the focus doesn't move to the message.
comments.creator: jporterbugs@gmail.com
comments.text: The only side effect is that when you collapse the attachment pane in the standalone message window, the focus doesn't move to the message.
